GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.33 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
drm/meson: encoder_hdmi: Fix refcount leak in meson_encoder_hdmi_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 275fed7142fff5b27e176e53508196715043de5c, it was introduced in version v5.15.33 by commit 1c5439a716122cd86530d261cd1bf7ba43b3cdd8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/meson: encoder_hdmi: Fix refcount leak in meson_encoder_hdmi_init
